Entries.EntryText: One of the towns' runners, Andy, has given you a message.  Dalin, the Chief Judge, needs to speak with you right away.  He is located in the Civic Building.
Dalin has asked you to deliver a message to Verto (he is located in the guard barracks).  Tell him that a search and rescue party is to be formed.  Verto is to lead the team as soon as possible.
You delivered Dalin's message to Verto.

Your sister and her friends have been abducted and you must find them if you can.  Their last known location was at the secret falls.  You can go it alone or travel with the search and rescue team. If you wish to question Tindra, she can be found at the Sanctuary.
You found your sister and her friends and set them free.

Entries.EntryTitle: Joining the Search and Rescue Team
Entries.EntryText: Dalin has asked you to deliver a message to Verto (he is located in the guard barracks).  Tell him that a search and rescue party is to be formed.  Verto is to lead the team as soon as possible.

Entries.EntryTitle: Joined the Search and Rescue Team
Entries.EntryText: You have joined the Search and Rescue team.
You have agreed to retrieve some items for Verto.  Go to the general store and present the list to Mero.
You have delivered the list to Mero and collected the items.
You have delivered the supplies to Verto.

The girls are off to warn Charn of The Exile's plans and hopefully rally support from the Wood Elves, Mountain Dwarves, and Talking Beasts.  When you are ready, head back to Charn.  Upon arriving, report to Dalin in the Civic Building.
